document.full_text: japanese officials denied on sunday the government will ask banks to forgive loans to tokyo electric power co  to help it cope with massive compensation claims arising from the crisis at a stricken nuclear power plant.
document.title: japan officials deny asking for tepco loan waiver
lines_and_colors: japanese officials denied on sunday the government will ask banks to forgive loans to tokyo electric power co  to help it cope with massive compensation claims arising from the crisis at a stricken nuclear power plant.
